item.description:
Fixes and Improvements

  • Adds the import and export menus to the menu bar
  • Fixes an issue where the gallery view was not occupying all available space
  • Fixes a visual bug in the gallery strip

New Features

  • Adds the ability to export icons in an alternate format when dragging them to other applications by pressing and holding ⌥ option before starting to drag
  • Adds a setting to choose the preferred export format when dragging icons to other applications

Fixes and Improvements

  • When switching to the gallery view, the first icon is now selected automatically if no icon was selected previously
  • Improves the visual appearance of the gallery strip
  • Uses the correct background color for the icon view
  • Includes minor improvements

Fixes and Improvements

  • Uses dynamic text and selection background colors in the icon view based on the collection’s background color
  • Fixes an issue where the Updates tab was initially selected in the Settings window rather than the Appearance tab
  • Fixes an issue where the status bar in the sidebar was not displayed correctly
